courses: Foundations of Speech and Natural Language Processing (20/20)

research experience.title: Undergraduate research assistant at the University of Tehran
research experience.summary: I collected 100,000 comments on Amazon clothing products and developed a unique CNN-LSTM model for sentiment analysis. The model outperformed NB, SVM, LR, CNN, and LSTM models, achieving higher accuracy.

work experience.name: SnappFood
work experience.summary: Collaborating cross-functionally with business users, project managers and other engineers to implement practical solutions. I optimized order assignments and enhanced trip assignments using machine learning, optimization algorithms, and coroutine-based concurrency. I also refactored legacy codes, upgraded the framework, and onboarded new team members.

honors.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
honors.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
